titleStmt.title: A panegyrick to the King. By His Majesties most humble, most loyal, and most obedient subject and servant, Thomas Higgons.
titleStmt.author: Higgons, Thomas, Sir, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Herringman, at the signe of the Anchor in the lower walk of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
